questions.question: Neither of the twins (is/are) allergic to penicillin.

choices.answer: more about how well you use your time.

questions.question: I can’t decide whether I should give Maria the tickets, or Caitlyn.

choices.answer: give the tickets to Maria or to Caitlyn.
give Maria the tickets or Caitlyn.
